title: (x) tech sans on drum'n'bass poster sans - Isonorm {Stephen}
content:
[http://www.teipu.net/IMAGES/d004\_04.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20110603061632/http:/www.teipu.net/IMAGES/d004_04.jpg "http://www.teipu.net/IMAGES/d004\_04.jpg")

Looking for the "SUBWAY", "INSTANCE" etc font.

Thanks!
author: cuidado

comments.content:
Difficult to tell at that resolution, but could be [Neo Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20110603061632/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/neo-sans/) by Monotype.

And is it just me or is the kerning a little off?

Aha, of course its Neo Sans! Thanks.

The kerning probably IS off, as he is a designer not a typographer. We suck at typography! :S
When you say we, does that mean this is something you did, but converted to paths and forgot the font name? (just curious...)
i'm a norwegian designer as well, nothing more than that :)

This is [Neo Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20110603061632/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontpackage&startrow=1&records=&currpage=1&totalrecords=12&displayfontid=C.117386.0.0&fontRendererText=PSYCHOFREUD).  
This is [Isonorm](http://web.archive.org/web/20110603061632/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=verity.search&startrow=1&records=100&currpage=1&totalrecords=7&searchby=&searchID=&searchletter=&searchstr=isonorm&font_categories_checkbox=font_name_search&fontRendererText=PSYCHOFREUD).  
The font in question is probably Isonorm.
